content: Another quick two-hit combo he can employ is a quick side slice followed by an overhead slam. Since many of his combo attacks cover both vertical and horizontal hits, you can't just backpedal in one direction to evade them.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Non-Pure.md', within the main section titled 'Non-Pure', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Non-Pure' and the sub-subsection 'Non-Pure Miniboss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Another quick two-hit combo he can employ is a quick side slice followed by an overhead slam. Since many of his combo attacks cover both vertical and horizontal hits, you can't just backpedal in one direction to evade them.
